editor.metrics_using_defaults: Currently using defaults from totals data sources. Editing will save a custom list.
editor.helper_show_energy_flow: Adds the built-in Energy Flow (Sankey) graph below this card (requires Energy configuration).
editor.helper_show_top_devices: Adds a single-row list of top-consuming devices from Energy preferences (requires Energy configuration).
editor.helper_top_devices_max: Number of top-consuming device badges to display
editor.helper_show_solar_forecast: Shows a compact forecast panel aligned to the right.
editor.helper_weather_entity: If set, shows temperature and condition for today.
editor.helper_solar_forecast_today_entity: If set and no weather entity, shows today's expected solar production.
editor.helper_trend_graph_entities: Optional. Select one or more sensor entities to render as individual trend graphs (Tile features).
editor.helper_trend_graph_hours_to_show: Optional. Applies to all auto-generated trend graphs.
